title: Module 4: Vision-Language-Action (VLA)
description: Welcome to Module 4 of our ROS 2 and Humanoid Robotics educational book. This module focuses on the convergence of Large Language Models (LLMs) and Robotics, specifically on Vision-Language-Action systems that enable robots to understand natural language commands and execute complex tasks.

previous.title: Chapter 3: Nav2 Path Planning for Humanoid Robots
